overview: The story is the old bromide about two brawling buddies, duking it out over the same girl, in this case pert Jo Matheson (Jean Rogers). Owen and Brad own a salvage company, but split up over Jo. Both separately sign up for the army, and both are reunited in the Pacific.
tagline: The Screen's Newest Fighting Team Brings You A Screenful Of Thrills!
title: Rough, Tough and Ready
